snippet.title: [Omega Crafter] 1.0 Release Date Announcement Trailer / 正式版リリース日発表記念トレーラー
snippet.description:
Omega Crafter, the open-world survival crafting adventure developed by Preferred Networks, Inc. (PFN), merges action with automation in a heroic code-infused quest as it launches into 1.0 on  Steam Wednesday, May 14, 2025. 

オープンワールドサバイバルクラフトゲーム『Omega Crafter（オメガクラフター）』は、2025年5月15日（日本時間）に正式版をSteamにてリリースします。

🎮 Available on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2262080?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_content=official

Omega Crafter is an open-world survival craft game set in an under-development game world that is being attacked by a mysterious program.
Adventure, build a city, challenge mighty bosses with Grammi - your programmable sidekick - and friends in order to complete development of the game by the release date!

『Omega Crafter』は、謎の妨害プログラムにより開発難航中のゲームを舞台にしたオープンワールドサバイバルクラフトゲームです。
プログラマブルな相棒・グラミーと一緒に冒険し、街を作り、強大なボスに挑んで、ゲームを完成させましょう！

========================================
Publisher: Preferred Networks, Inc.
Developer: Preferred Networks, Inc.
https://www.preferred.jp/en/

🎮 Omega Crafter Steam Page
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2262080?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_content=official

💬 Omega Crafter Official Discord Server
https://discord.gg/nPVeyT7FSh

📢 Omega Crafter Official X (Twitter) Account
JP: https://twitter.com/omegacrafter_jp
EN: https://twitter.com/omegacrafter_en

========================================

#omegacrafter #steam
